name: Magical Girl Emmie's Step-By-Step Guide to Battle Royales
name_original: Magical Girl Emmie's Step-By-Step Guide to Battle Royales
description:
[Made as part of AI and Game's 2021 Inaugural Game Jam!  ....also as part of a last minute pivot so I do apologize for any bugginess or lack of polish ^^;;]

Magical Girl Emmie is, for currently mysterious reasons, testing her luck in a 5 stage Battle Royale.  

The odds are stacked against her since she doesn't *actually* know any magic.  Still, as her faithful and invisible familiar you can bend the rules in her favor via some Baba Is You inspired rule-swap mechanics.

As for the battle itself, no worries about twitch reflexes, it's turn-based baby!

Oh and if you fall of the edge don't worry, the Void will return any unit that falls into it back onto the map after a round...well...most of the time.  It does occasionally get Hungry so try not to fall off too much  

Controls:
Change Facing: [WASD] or [Arrow Keys]

SwapRules: Drag & Drop

Future Features:

A few Visual Novel style cutscenes 

A collection of new abilities to shape and trap the field while you wait for everyone to take their turn

A slew of QoL improvements

????

The incessant hum of a silent and uncaring universe will be replaced by, like, chiptune or something.
